title: Angel's Surrender
description: [Ménage Amour: Erotic Sci-Fi Ménage a Trois Romance, M/F/M, HEA]Angel Arts is a woman with a secret past. Gavin Marolf is a tall, amazingly muscular biker in a local gang that Angel has done artwork for. Gavin seems like the man of her dreams, other than his variety of unusual personal habits. When Gavin explains that he is actually a bounty hunter from another dimension, Angel is stunned. She finds herself caught between the dangers of her past and the possibility of a future with Gavin. While Gavin is tracking an organ dealer, he sets up a meeting between Angel and her late husband’s counterpart, Racer. Racer is sweet and charming. He is a Bok, a cross between a naturopath and a white warlock, but Racer has secrets of his own. Angel is swept into a wave of tears and treachery that threatens to tear her entire world apart. Will the two men she loves be able to save her?A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Kat Barrett
